nycTheatreExcerpt: Illinoise is a thrilling and absolutely gorgeous dance celebration of singer-songwriter Sufjan Stevens' 2005 early-career masterpiece LP Illinois, using a large cast of dancer-actors  and three excellent singers, along with that extra "e" at the end of the show title  to flesh out the loose story that might (or might not) have stayed hidden in the grooves of the concept album all along."
